Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Are you going to let him talk to you like that? I thought you were pretty high up in the food chain, Boss?

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: I am, but no one is above Command. Just shut up and play the mission report, Glados.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: I'm not your phone. Did you ever watch The Matrix? I think you should ask more nicely...
